[BITMASK_DEFINITIONS]


Defines

#define RDB_VEHICLE_LIGHT_OFF   0x00000000

------ light states ------

#define RDB_VEHICLE_LIGHT_DRL   0x00000800

0x0100

Version:
0x0100

if received via RDB, RDB will be the only source for the light mask

Version:
0x0111
